anya-e0102n11:2_0: 854. Yaṁ pana vuttaṁ ‘‘paññābhāvanāya ko ānisaṁso’’ti, tattha vadāma. Ayañhi paññābhāvanā
anya-e0102n11:2_1: nāma anekasatānisaṁsā. Tassā dīghenāpi addhunā na sukaraṁ vitthārato ānisaṁsaṁ pakāsetuṁ.
anya-e0102n11:4_0: 855. Tattha yaṁ nāmarūpaparicchedato paṭṭhāya sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṁ vasena nānākilesaviddhaṁsanaṁ
anya-e0102n11:4_1: vuttaṁ, ayaṁ lokikāya paññābhāvanāya ānisaṁso. Yaṁ ariyamaggakkhaṇe saṁyojanādīnaṁ
anya-e0102n11:4_2: vasena nānākilesaviddhaṁsanaṁ vuttaṁ, ayaṁ lokuttarāya paññābhāvanāya ānisaṁsoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n11:12_1: paññābhāvanāya ānisaṁso. Ariyaphalanti hi sotāpattiphalādi sāmaññaphalaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0102n11:12_2: Tassa dvīhākārehi rasānubhavanaṁ hoti. Maggavīthiyañca phalasamāpattivasena ca pavattiyaṁ.
anya-e0102n11:13_0: 857. Apica ye ‘‘saṁyojanappahānamattameva phalaṁ nāma, na koci añño dhammo atthī’’ti
anya-e0102n11:13_1: vadanti, tesaṁ anunayatthaṁ idaṁ suttampi dassetabbaṁ – ‘‘kathaṁ payogapaṭippassaddhipaññā
anya-e0102n11:13_2: phale ñāṇaṁ? Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi micchādiṭṭhiyā vuṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n11:13_3: tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vuṭṭhāti, bahiddhā ca sabbanimittehi vuṭṭhāti.
anya-e0102n11:13_4: Tampayogapaṭippassaddhattā uppajjati sammādiṭṭhi, maggassetaṁ phala’’nti (paṭi. ma.
anya-e0102n11:14_0: ‘‘Cattāro maggā apariyāpannā, cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni, ime dhammā appamāṇārammaṇā’’
anya-e0102n11:14_1: (dha. sa. 1422). ‘‘Mahaggato dhammo appamāṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo’’ti
anya-e0102n11:15_0: 858. Phalasamāpattiyaṁ pavattidassanatthaṁ panassa idaṁ pañhākammaṁ – kā phalasamāpatti,
anya-e0102n11:15_1: ke taṁ samāpajjanti, ke na samāpajjanti, kasmā samāpajjanti, kathañcassā samāpajjanaṁ
anya-e0102n11:15_2: hoti, kathaṁ ṭhānaṁ, kathaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ, kiṁ phalassa anantaraṁ, kassa ca phalaṁ anantaranti?
anya-e0102n11:16: 859. Tattha kā phalasamāpattīti yā ariyaphalassa nirodhe appanā.
anya-e0102n11:17_0: 860.Ke taṁ samāpajjanti, ke na samāpajjantīti sabbepi puthujjanā na samāpajjanti.
anya-e0102n11:17_1: Kasmā? Anadhigatattā. Ariyā pana sabbepi samāpajjanti. Kasmā? Adhigatattā. Uparimā
anya-e0102n11:17_2: pana heṭṭhimaṁ na samāpajjanti, puggalantarabhāvupagamanena paṭippassaddhattā. Heṭṭhimā
anya-e0102n11:17_3: ca uparimaṁ, anadhigatattā. Attano attanoyeva pana phalaṁ samāpajjantīti idamettha sanniṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0102n11:18_0: Keci pana ‘‘sotāpannasakadāgāminopi na samāpajjanti. Uparimā dveyeva samāpajjantī’’ti
anya-e0102n11:18_1: vadanti. Idañca tesaṁ kāraṇaṁ, ete hi samādhismiṁ paripūrakārinoti. Taṁ puthujjanassāpi
anya-e0102n11:18_3: Nanu pāḷiyaṁyeva vuttaṁ – ‘‘katame dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjanti?
anya-e0102n11:18_4: Sotāpattimaggapaṭilābhatthāya uppādaṁ pavattaṁ…pe… upāyāsaṁ bahiddhā saṅkhāranimittaṁ
anya-e0102n11:18_7: saṅkhāranimittaṁ abhibhuyyatīti gotrabhū’’ti (paṭi. ma. 1.60). Tasmā sabbepi ariyā
anya-e0102n11:18_8: attano attano phalaṁ samāpajjantīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n11:19_0: 861.Kasmā samāpajjantīti diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṁ. Yathā hi rājā rajjasukhaṁ,
anya-e0102n11:19_1: devatā dibbasukhaṁ anubhavanti, evaṁ ariyā ‘‘ariyaṁ lokuttarasukhaṁ anubhavissāmā’’ti
anya-e0102n11:20_0: 862.Kathañcassā samāpajjanaṁ hoti, kathaṁ ṭhānaṁ, kathaṁ vuṭṭhānanti dvīhi tāva ākārehi
anya-e0102n11:20_1: assā samāpajjanaṁ hoti – nibbānato aññassa ārammaṇassa amanasikārā nibbānassa ca
anya-e0102n11:20_2: manasikārā. Yathāha – ‘‘dve kho, āvuso, paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā samāpattiyā
anya-e0102n11:20_3: sabbanimittānañca amanasikāro, animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāro’’ti (ma. ni. 1.458).
anya-e0102n11:21_0: 863. Ayampanettha samāpajjanakkamo. Phalasamāpattatthikena hi ariyasāvakena rahogatena
anya-e0102n11:21_1: paṭisallīnena udayabbayādivasena saṅkhārā vipassitabbā. Tassa pavattānupubbavipassanassa
anya-e0102n11:21_2: saṅkhārārammaṇagotrabhuñāṇānantarā phalasamāpattivasena nirodhe cittaṁ appeti. Phalasamāpattininnatāya
anya-e0102n11:21_3: cettha sekkhassāpi phalameva uppajjati, na maggo.
anya-e0102n11:22_0: Ye pana vadanti ‘‘sotāpanno ‘phalasamāpattiṁ samāpajjissāmī’ti vipassanaṁ paṭṭhapetvā
anya-e0102n11:22_1: sakadāgāmī hoti. Sakadāgāmī ca anāgāmī’’ti, te vattabbā ‘‘evaṁ sati anāgāmī arahā
anya-e0102n11:22_2: bhavissati, arahā paccekabuddho, paccekabuddho ca buddho. Tasmā na kiñci etaṁ, pāḷivaseneva
anya-e0102n11:22_3: ca paṭikkhitta’’ntipi na gahetabbaṁ. Idameva pana gahetabbaṁ – sekkhassāpi phalameva
anya-e0102n11:22_4: uppajjati, na maggo. Phalañcassa sace anena paṭhamajjhāniko maggo adhigato hoti.
anya-e0102n11:22_5: Paṭhamajjhānikameva uppajjati. Sace dutiyādīsu aññatarajjhāniko, dutiyādīsu aññatarajjhānikamevāti.
anya-e0102n11:23_0: 864. ‘‘Tayo kho, āvuso, paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā ṭhitiyā sabbanimittānañca
anya-e0102n11:23_1: amanasikāro, animittāya ca dhātuyā manasikāro, pubbe ca abhisaṅkhāro’’ti (ma. ni.
anya-e0102n11:23_2: 1.458) vacanato panassā tīhākārehi ṭhānaṁ hoti. Tattha pubbe ca abhisaṅkhāroti samāpattito
anya-e0102n11:23_3: pubbe kālaparicchedo. ‘‘Asukasmiṁ nāma kāle vuṭṭhahissāmī’’ti paricchinnattā hissā
anya-e0102n11:23_4: yāva so kālo nāgacchati, tāva ṭhānaṁ hoti. Evamassā ṭhānaṁ hotīti.
anya-e0102n11:24_0: 865. ‘‘Dve kho, āvuso, paccayā animittāya cetovimuttiyā vuṭṭhānāya sabbanimittānañca
anya-e0102n11:24_1: manasikāro, animittāya ca dhātuyā amanasikāro’’ti (ma. ni. 1.458) vacanato panassā
anya-e0102n11:24_3: Kāmañca na sabbānevetāni ekato manasikaroti sabbasaṅgāhikavasena panetaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n11:24_4: Tasmā yaṁ bhavaṅgassa ārammaṇaṁ hoti, taṁ manasikaroto phalasamāpattivuṭṭhānaṁ hotīti
anya-e0102n11:25_0: 866.Kiṁ phalassa anantaraṁ, kassa ca phalaṁ anantaranti phalassa tāva phalameva vā
anya-e0102n11:25_1: anantaraṁ hoti, bhavaṅgaṁ vā. Phalaṁ pana atthi maggānantaraṁ, atthi phalānantaraṁ,
anya-e0102n11:25_2: atthi gotrabhuanantaraṁ, atthi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanānantaraṁ. Tattha maggavīthiyaṁ
anya-e0102n11:25_3: maggānantaraṁ, purimassa purimassa pacchimaṁ pacchimaṁ phalānantaraṁ. Phalasamāpattīsu
anya-e0102n11:25_4: purimaṁ purimaṁ gotrabhuanantaraṁ. Gotrabhūti cettha anulomaṁ veditabbaṁ. Vuttañhetaṁ
anya-e0102n11:25_5: paṭṭhāne – ‘‘arahato anulomaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. Sekkhānaṁ
anya-e0102n11:25_6: anulomaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo’’ti (paṭṭhā. 1.1.417). Yena phalena
anya-e0102n11:25_7: nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti, taṁ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanānantaranti. Tattha ṭhapetvā maggavīthiyaṁ
anya-e0102n11:25_8: uppannaṁ phalaṁ avasesaṁ sabbaṁ phalasamāpattivasena pavattaṁ nāma. Evametaṁ maggavīthiyaṁ
anya-e0102n11:31: Phalassa paññaṁ bhāvetvā, yasmā vindati paṇḍito.
anya-e0102n11:35_1: ayaṁ pana nirodhasamāpattiyā samāpajjanasamatthatāpi imissā paññābhāvanāya ānisaṁsoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n11:36_0: Tatridaṁ nirodhasamāpattiyā vibhāvanatthaṁ pañhākammaṁ – kā nirodhasamāpatti, ke
anya-e0102n11:36_1: taṁ samāpajjanti, ke na samāpajjanti, kattha samāpajjanti, kasmā samāpajjanti, kathañcassā
anya-e0102n11:36_2: samāpajjanaṁ hoti, kathaṁ ṭhānaṁ, kathaṁ vuṭṭhānaṁ, vuṭṭhitassa kiṁninnaṁ cittaṁ
anya-e0102n11:36_3: hoti, matassa ca samāpannassa ca ko viseso, nirodhasamāpatti kiṁ saṅkhatā asaṅkhatā
anya-e0102n11:37_0: 868. Tattha kā nirodhasamāpattīti yā anupubbanirodhavasena cittacetasikānaṁ dhammānaṁ
anya-e0102n11:37_1: appavatti. Ke taṁ samāpajjanti, ke na samāpajjantīti sabbepi puthujjanā, sotāpannā,
anya-e0102n11:37_2: sakadāgāmino, sukkhavipassakā ca anāgāmino, arahanto na samāpajjanti. Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino
anya-e0102n11:37_3: pana anāgāmino, khīṇāsavā ca samāpajjanti. ‘‘Dvīhi balehi samannāgatattā , tayo ca
anya-e0102n11:37_4: saṅkhārānaṁ paṭippassaddhiyā, soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhi, navahi samādhicariyāhi vasībhāvatā
anya-e0102n11:37_5: paññā nirodhasamāpattiyā ñāṇa’’nti (paṭi. ma. mātikā 1.34) hi vuttaṁ. Ayañca sampadā
anya-e0102n11:37_6: ṭhapetvā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino anāgāmikhīṇāsave aññesaṁ natthi. Tasmā teyeva samāpajjanti, na aññe.
anya-e0102n11:38: 869. Katamāni panettha dve balāni…pe… katamā vasībhāvatāti? Na ettha kiñci amhehi vattabbaṁ atthi. Sabbamidaṁ etassa uddesassa niddese vuttameva. Yathāha –
anya-e0102n11:39_0: ‘‘Dvīhibalehīti dve balāni samathabalaṁ vipassanābalaṁ. Katamaṁ samathabalaṁ? Nekkhammavasena
anya-e0102n11:39_1: cittassa ekaggatā avikkhepo samathabalaṁ. Abyāpādavasena… ālokasaññāvasena… avikkhepavasena…pe…
anya-e0102n11:39_3: avikkhepo samathabalanti. Kenaṭṭhena samathabalaṁ? Paṭhamajjhānena nīvaraṇe na kampatīti
anya-e0102n11:39_5: ākiñcaññāyatanasaññāya na kampatīti samathabalaṁ. Uddhacce ca uddhaccasahagatakilese
anya-e0102n11:39_6: ca khandhe ca na kampati na calati na vedhatīti samathabalaṁ. Idaṁ samathabalaṁ.
anya-e0102n11:40_2: Rūpe aniccānupassanā…pe… rūpe paṭinissaggānupassanā vipassanābalaṁ. Vedanāya… saññāya…
anya-e0102n11:40_3: saṅkhāresu… viññāṇe… cakkhusmiṁ…pe… jarāmaraṇe aniccānupassanā. Jarāmaraṇe paṭinissaggānupassanā
anya-e0102n11:40_4: vipassanābalanti. Kenaṭṭhena vipassanābalaṁ? Aniccānupassanāya niccasaññāya na kampatīti
anya-e0102n11:40_5: vipassanābalaṁ. Dukkhānupassanāya sukhasaññāya na kampatīti… anattānupassanāya attasaññāya
anya-e0102n11:40_6: na kampatīti… nibbidānupassanāya nandiyā na kampatīti… virāgānupassanāya rāge na
anya-e0102n11:40_7: kampatīti… nirodhānupassanāya samudaye na kampatīti… paṭinissaggānupassanāya ādāne
anya-e0102n11:40_8: na kampatīti vipassanābalaṁ. Avijjāya ca avijjāsahagatakilese ca khandhe ca na kampati
anya-e0102n11:40_9: na calati na vedhatīti vipassanābalaṁ. Idaṁ vipassanābalaṁ.
anya-e0102n11:41_0: ‘‘Tayo ca saṅkhārānaṁ paṭippassaddhiyāti katamesaṁ tiṇṇannaṁ saṅkhārānaṁ paṭippassaddhiyā?
anya-e0102n11:41_1: Dutiyajjhānaṁ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā vacīsaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā honti. Catutthaṁ
anya-e0102n11:41_2: jhānaṁ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā kāyasaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā honti. Saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ
anya-e0102n11:41_3: samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca cittasaṅkhārā paṭippassaddhā honti. Imesaṁ tiṇṇannaṁ
anya-e0102n11:42_1: Dukkhā… anattā… nibbidā… virāgā… nirodhā… paṭinissaggā… vivaṭṭānupassanā ñāṇacariyā.
anya-e0102n11:43_0: ‘‘Navahi samādhicariyāhīti katamāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi? Paṭhamajjhānaṁ samādhicariyā.
anya-e0102n11:43_2: vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṁ
anya-e0102n11:43_3: paṭilābhatthāya vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti ca sukhañca cittekaggatā ca. Imāhi navahi samādhicariyāhi.
anya-e0102n11:44_0: ‘‘Vasīti pañca vasiyo – āvajjanavasī, samāpajjanavasī, adhiṭṭhānavasī, vuṭṭhānavasī,
anya-e0102n11:44_1: paccavekkhaṇavasī. Paṭhamajjhānaṁ yatthicchakaṁ yadicchakaṁ yāvaticchakaṁ āvajjati,
anya-e0102n11:44_2: āvajjanāya dandhāyitattaṁ natthīti āvajjanavasī. Paṭhamajjhānaṁ yatthicchakaṁ yadicchakaṁ
anya-e0102n11:44_3: yāvaticchakaṁ samāpajjati, samāpajjanāya dandhāyitattaṁ natthīti samāpajjanavasī…pe…
anya-e0102n11:44_4: adhiṭṭhāti adhiṭṭhāne…pe… vuṭṭhāti vuṭṭhāne…pe… paccavekkhati paccavekkhaṇāya dandhāyitattaṁ
anya-e0102n11:44_6: yadicchakaṁ yāvaticchakaṁ āvajjati …pe… paccavekkhati. Paccavekkhaṇāya dandhāyitattaṁ
anya-e0102n11:44_7: natthīti paccavekkhaṇavasī. Imā pañca vasiyo’’ti (paṭi. ma. 1.83).
anya-e0102n11:45_0: 870. Ettha ca ‘‘soḷasahi ñāṇacariyāhī’’ti ukkaṭṭhaniddeso esa. Anāgāmino pana cuddasahi
anya-e0102n11:45_1: ñāṇacariyāhi hoti. Yadi evaṁ sakadāgāmino dvādasahi sotāpannassa ca dasahi kiṁ na
anya-e0102n11:45_2: hotīti? Na hoti, samādhipāribandhikassa pañca kāmaguṇikarāgassa appahīnattā. Tesaṁ
anya-e0102n11:45_3: hi so appahīno. Tasmā samathabalaṁ na paripuṇṇaṁ hoti, tasmiṁ aparipūre dvīhi balehi
anya-e0102n11:45_4: samāpajjitabbaṁ nirodhasamāpattiṁ balavekallena samāpajjituṁ na sakkonti. Anāgāmissa
anya-e0102n11:45_5: pana so pahīno, tasmā esa paripuṇṇabalo hoti. Paripuṇṇabalattā sakkoti. Tenāha bhagavā
anya-e0102n11:45_7: paccayo’’ti (paṭṭhā. 1.1.417). Idañhi paṭṭhāne mahāpakaraṇe anāgāminova nirodhā vuṭṭhānaṁ sandhāya vuttanti.
anya-e0102n11:46_1: pana paṭhamajjhānādīnaṁ uppatti natthi. Tasmā na sakkā tattha samāpajjitunti. Keci
anya-e0102n11:47: 872.Kasmā samāpajjantīti saṅkhārānaṁ pavattibhede ukkaṇṭhitvā diṭṭheva dhamme acittakā hutvā ‘‘nirodhaṁ nibbānaṁ patvā sukhaṁ viharissāmā’’ti samāpajjanti.
anya-e0102n11:48_1: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ nirodhayato, evamassa samāpajjanaṁ hoti. Yo hi samathavaseneva
anya-e0102n11:48_2: ussakkati, so nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiṁ patvā tiṭṭhati. Yo pana vipassanāvaseneva
anya-e0102n11:48_3: ussakkati, so phalasamāpattiṁ patvā tiṭṭhati. Yo pana ubhayavaseneva ussakkitvā pubbakiccaṁ
anya-e0102n11:48_4: katvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ nirodheti, so taṁ samāpajjatīti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
anya-e0102n11:49_0: 874. Ayaṁ pana vitthāro – idha bhikkhu nirodhaṁ samāpajjitukāmo katabhattakicco sudhotahatthapādo
anya-e0102n11:49_1: vivitte okāse supaññattamhi āsane nisīdati pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya
anya-e0102n11:49_2: parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā, so paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre
anya-e0102n11:50_0: Vipassanā panesā tividhā hoti – saṅkhāraparigaṇhanakavipassanā, phalasamāpattivipassanā,
anya-e0102n11:50_1: nirodhasamāpattivipassanāti. Tattha saṅkhāraparigaṇhanakavipassanā mandā vā hotu
anya-e0102n11:50_2: tikkhā vā, maggassa padaṭṭhānaṁ hotiyeva. Phalasamāpattivipassanā tikkhāva vaṭṭati
anya-e0102n11:50_3: maggabhāvanāsadisā. Nirodhasamāpattivipassanā pana nātimandanātitikkhā vaṭṭati. Tasmā
anya-e0102n11:50_4: esa nātimandāya nātitikkhāya vipassanāya te saṅkhāre vipassati.
anya-e0102n11:51_0: Tato dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassati. Tato
anya-e0102n11:51_1: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ…pe… tato viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tatheva
anya-e0102n11:51_2: vipassati. Tathā ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya catubbidhaṁ pubbakiccaṁ karoti
anya-e0102n11:52_0: 875. Tattha nānābaddhaavikopananti yaṁ iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekābaddhaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0102n11:52_1: nānābaddhaṁ hutvā ṭhitaṁ pattacīvaraṁ vā mañcapīṭhaṁ vā nivāsagehaṁ vā aññaṁ vā pana
anya-e0102n11:52_2: kiñci parikkhārajātaṁ, taṁ yathā na vikuppati, aggiudakavātacoraundūrādīnaṁ vasena
anya-e0102n11:53_0: Tatridaṁ adhiṭṭhānavidhānaṁ ‘‘idañca idañca imasmiṁ sattāhabbhantare mā agginā jhāyatu,
anya-e0102n11:53_1: mā udakena vuyhatu, mā vātena viddhaṁsatu, mā corehi hariyatu, mā undūrādīhi khajjatū’’ti.
anya-e0102n11:53_2: Evaṁ adhiṭṭhite taṁ sattāhaṁ tassa na koci parissayo hoti.
anya-e0102n11:54_0: Anadhiṭṭhahato pana aggiādīhi vinassati mahānāgattherassa viya. Thero kira mātuupāsikāya
anya-e0102n11:54_1: gāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Upāsikā yāguṁ datvā āsanasālāya nisīdāpesi. Thero nirodhaṁ
anya-e0102n11:54_2: samāpajjitvā nisīdi. Tasmiṁ nisinne āsanasālāya agginā gahitāya sesabhikkhū attano
anya-e0102n11:54_3: attano nisinnāsanaṁ gahetvā palāyiṁsu. Gāmavāsikā sannipatitvā theraṁ disvā ‘‘alasasamaṇo’’ti
anya-e0102n11:54_4: āhaṁsu. Aggi tiṇaveṇukaṭṭhāni jhāpetvā theraṁ parikkhipitvā aṭṭhāsi. Manussā ghaṭehi
anya-e0102n11:54_5: udakaṁ āharitvā nibbāpetvā chārikaṁ apanetvā paribhaṇḍaṁ katvā pupphāni vikiritvā
anya-e0102n11:54_6: namassamānā aṭṭhaṁsu. Thero paricchinnakālavasena vuṭṭhāya te disvā ‘‘pākaṭomhi jāto’’ti
anya-e0102n11:54_7: vehāsaṁ uppatitvā piyaṅgudīpaṁ agamāsi. Idaṁ nānābaddhaavikopanaṁ nāma.
anya-e0102n11:55_0: Yaṁ ekābaddhaṁ hoti nivāsanapāvuraṇaṁ vā nisinnāsanaṁ vā, tattha visuṁ adhiṭṭhānakiccaṁ
anya-e0102n11:55_1: natthi. Samāpattivaseneva naṁ rakkhati āyasmato sañjīvassa viya . Vuttampi cetaṁ
anya-e0102n11:55_2: ‘‘āyasmato sañjīvassa samādhivipphārā iddhi, āyasmato sāriputtassa samādhivipphārā iddhī’’ti.
anya-e0102n11:56_0: 876.Saṅghapaṭimānananti saṅghassa paṭimānanaṁ udikkhanaṁ. Yāva eso bhikkhu āgacchati,
anya-e0102n11:56_1: tāva saṅghakammassa akaraṇanti attho. Ettha ca na paṭimānanaṁ etassa pubbakiccaṁ,
anya-e0102n11:56_2: paṭimānanāvajjanaṁ pana pubbakiccaṁ. Tasmā evaṁ āvajjitabbaṁ ‘‘sace mayi sattāhaṁ
anya-e0102n11:56_3: nirodhaṁ samāpajjitvā nisinne saṅgho uttikammādīsu kiñcideva kammaṁ kattukāmo hoti,
anya-e0102n11:56_4: yāva maṁ koci bhikkhu āgantvā na pakkosati, tāvadeva vuṭṭhahissāmī’’ti. Evaṁ katvā
anya-e0102n11:57_0: Yo pana evaṁ na karoti, saṅgho ca sannipatitvā taṁ apassanto ‘‘asuko bhikkhu kuhi’’nti
anya-e0102n11:57_1: ‘‘nirodhasamāpanno’’ti vutte saṅgho kañci bhikkhuṁ peseti ‘‘gaccha naṁ saṅghassa
anya-e0102n11:57_2: vacanena pakkosāhī’’ti. Athassa tena bhikkhunā savanūpacāre ṭhatvā ‘‘saṅgho taṁ āvuso
anya-e0102n11:57_3: paṭimānetī’’ti vuttamatteva vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti. Evaṁ garukā hi saṅghassa āṇā nāma. Tasmā
anya-e0102n11:57_4: taṁ āvajjitvā yathā sayameva vuṭṭhāti, evaṁ samāpajjitabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n11:58_0: 877.Satthupakkosananti idhāpi satthupakkosanāvajjanameva imassa kiccaṁ. Tasmā tampi
anya-e0102n11:58_1: evaṁ āvajjitabbaṁ ‘‘sace mayi sattāhaṁ nirodhaṁ samāpajjitvā nisinne satthā otiṇṇavatthusmiṁ
anya-e0102n11:58_2: sikkhāpadaṁ vā paññapeti, tathārūpāya vā atthuppattiyā dhammaṁ deseti, yāva maṁ koci
anya-e0102n11:58_3: āgantvā na pakkosati, tāvadeva vuṭṭhahissāmī’’ti. Evaṁ katvā nisinno hi tasmiṁ samaye vuṭṭhātiyeva.
anya-e0102n11:59_0: Yo pana evaṁ na karoti, satthā ca saṅghe sannipatite taṁ apassanto ‘‘asuko bhikkhu
anya-e0102n11:59_1: kuhi’’nti ‘‘nirodhasamāpanno’’ti vutte kañci bhikkhuṁ peseti ‘‘gaccha naṁ mama vacanena
anya-e0102n11:59_2: pakkosā’’ti. Athassa tena bhikkhunā savanūpacāre ṭhatvā ‘‘satthā āyasmantaṁ āmantetī’’ti
anya-e0102n11:59_3: vuttamatteva vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti. Evaṁ garukaṁ hi satthupakkosanaṁ, tasmā taṁ āvajjitvā
anya-e0102n11:60_1: sukusalena bhavitabbaṁ. Attano ‘‘āyusaṅkhārā sattāhaṁ pavattissanti na pavattissantī’’ti
anya-e0102n11:60_2: āvajjitvāva samāpajjitabbaṁ. Sace hi sattāhabbhantare nirujjhanake āyusaṅkhāre anāvajjitvāva
anya-e0102n11:60_3: samāpajjati, nāssa nirodhasamāpatti maraṇaṁ paṭibāhituṁ sakkoti. Antonirodhe maraṇassa
anya-e0102n11:60_4: natthitāya antarāva samāpattito vuṭṭhāti. Tasmā etaṁ āvajjitvāva samāpajjitabbaṁ.
anya-e0102n11:60_5: Avasesaṁ hi anāvajjitumpi vaṭṭati. Idaṁ pana āvajjitabbamevāti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0102n11:61_0: 879. So evaṁ ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya imaṁ pubbakiccaṁ katvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ
anya-e0102n11:61_1: samāpajjati. Athekaṁ vā dve vā cittavāre atikkamitvā acittako hoti, nirodhaṁ phusati.
anya-e0102n11:61_2: Kasmā panassa dvinnaṁ cittānaṁ uparicittāni na pavattantīti? Nirodhassa payogattā.
anya-e0102n11:61_3: Idañhi imassa bhikkhuno dve samathavipassanādhamme yuganaddhe katvā aṭṭha samāpattiārohanaṁ
anya-e0102n11:61_4: anupubbanirodhassa payogo, na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyāti nirodhassa payogattā
anya-e0102n11:62_0: Yo pana bhikkhu ākiñcaññāyatanato vuṭṭhāya idaṁ pubbakiccaṁ akatvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ
anya-e0102n11:62_1: samāpajjati, so parato acittako bhavituṁ na sakkoti, paṭinivattitvā puna ākiñcaññāyataneyeva
anya-e0102n11:63_0: Eko kira puriso ekaṁ maggaṁ agatapubbo antarā udakakandaraṁ vā gambhīraṁ udakacikkhallaṁ
anya-e0102n11:63_1: atikkamitvā ṭhapitaṁ caṇḍātapasantattapāsāṇaṁ vā āgamma taṁ nivāsanapāvuraṇaṁ asaṇṭhapetvāva
anya-e0102n11:63_2: kandaraṁ orūḷho parikkhāratemanabhayena punadeva tīre patiṭṭhāti. Pāsāṇaṁ akkamitvāpi
anya-e0102n11:63_3: santattapādo punadeva orabhāge patiṭṭhāti. Tattha yathā so puriso asaṇṭhapitanivāsanapāvuraṇattā
anya-e0102n11:63_4: kandaraṁ otiṇṇamattova, tattapāsāṇaṁ akkantamatto eva ca paṭinivattitvā oratova patiṭṭhāti,
anya-e0102n11:63_5: evaṁ yogāvacaropi pubbakiccassa akatattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samāpannamattova
anya-e0102n11:64_0: Yathā pana pubbepi taṁ maggaṁ gatapubbapuriso taṁ ṭhānaṁ āgamma ekaṁ sāṭakaṁ daḷhaṁ
anya-e0102n11:64_1: nivāsetvā aparaṁ hatthena gahetvā kandaraṁ uttaritvā tattapāsāṇaṁ vā akkantamattakameva
anya-e0102n11:64_2: karitvā parato gacchati, evamevaṁ katapubbakicco bhikkhu nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ
anya-e0102n11:64_3: samāpajjitvāva parato acittako hutvā nirodhaṁ phusitvā viharati.
anya-e0102n11:65: 880.Kathaṁ ṭhānanti evaṁ samāpannāya panassā kālaparicchedavasena ceva antarāāyukkhayasaṅghapaṭimānanasatthupakkosanābhāvena ca ṭhānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n11:66: 881.Kathaṁ vuṭṭhānanti anāgāmissa anāgāmiphaluppattiyā, arahato arahattaphaluppattiyāti evaṁ dvedhā vuṭṭhānaṁ hoti.
anya-e0102n11:67_0: 882.Vuṭṭhitassa kiṁninnaṁ cittaṁ hotīti nibbānaninnaṁ. Vuttaṁ hetaṁ ‘‘saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattiyā
anya-e0102n11:67_1: vuṭṭhitassa kho, āvuso visākha, bhikkhuno vivekaninnaṁ cittaṁ hoti vivekapoṇaṁ vivekapabbhāra’’nti (ma. ni. 1.464).
anya-e0102n11:68_0: 883.Matassa ca samāpannassa ca ko visesoti ayampi attho sutte vuttoyeva. Yathāha
anya-e0102n11:68_1: – ‘‘yvāyaṁ, āvuso, mato kālaṅkato, tassa kāyasaṅkhārā niruddhā paṭippassaddhā, vacīsaṅkhārā…
anya-e0102n11:68_2: cittasaṅkhārā niruddhā paṭippassaddhā, āyu parikkhīṇo, usmā vūpasantā, indriyāni
anya-e0102n11:68_3: paribhinnāni. Yo cāyaṁ bhikkhu saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ samāpanno, tassapi kāyasaṅkhārā
anya-e0102n11:68_4: niruddhā paṭippassaddhā, vacīsaṅkhārā… cittasaṅkhārā niruddhā paṭippassaddhā, āyu
anya-e0102n11:68_5: aparikkhīṇo, usmā avūpasantā, indriyāni aparibhinnānī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.457).
anya-e0102n11:69_1: lokuttarātipi na vattabbā. Kasmā? Sabhāvato natthitāya. Yasmā panassā samāpajjantassa
anya-e0102n11:69_2: vasena samāpannā nāma hoti, tasmā nipphannāti vattuṁ vaṭṭati, no anipphannā.
anya-e0102n11:76_1: ayaṁ pana āhuneyyabhāvādisiddhipi imissā lokuttarapaññābhāvanāya ānisaṁsoti veditabbo.
anya-e0102n11:76_2: Avisesena hi catubbidhāyapi etissā bhāvitattā bhāvitapañño puggalo sadevakassa lokassa
anya-e0102n11:76_3: āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalīkaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassa.
anya-e0102n11:77_0: 886. Visesato panettha paṭhamamaggapaññaṁ tāva bhāvetvā mandāya vipassanāya āgato
anya-e0102n11:77_1: mudindriyopi sattakkhattuparamo nāma hoti, sattasugatibhave saṁsaritvā dukkhassantaṁ
anya-e0102n11:77_2: karoti. Majjhimāya vipassanāya āgato majjhimindriyo kolaṁkolo nāma hoti, dve vā tīṇi
anya-e0102n11:77_3: vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṁsaritvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti. Tikkhāya vipassanāya āgato
anya-e0102n11:77_4: tikkhindriyo ekabījī nāma hoti, ekaññeva mānusakaṁ bhavaṁ nibbattetvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti.
anya-e0102n11:78: 887. Dutiyamaggapaññaṁ bhāvetvā sakadāgāmī nāma hoti, sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti.
anya-e0102n11:79_0: 888. Tatiyamaggapaññaṁ bhāvetvā anāgāmī nāma hoti. So indriyavemattatāvasena antarāparinibbāyī,
anya-e0102n11:79_2: pañcadhā. Idha vihāyaniṭṭho hoti. Tattha antarāparinibbāyīti yattha katthaci suddhāvāsabhave
anya-e0102n11:79_3: upapajjitvā āyuvemajjhaṁ appatvāva parinibbāyati. Upahaccaparinibbāyīti āyuvemajjhaṁ
anya-e0102n11:79_4: atikkamitvā parinibbāyati. Asaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti asaṅkhārena appayogena uparimaggaṁ
anya-e0102n11:79_5: nibbatteti. Sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti sasaṅkhārena sappayogena uparimaggaṁ nibbatteti.
anya-e0102n11:79_6: Uddhaṁsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti yatthupapanno, tato uddhaṁ yāva akaniṭṭhabhavā āruyha
anya-e0102n11:80_0: 889. Catutthamaggapaññaṁ bhāvetvā koci saddhāvimutto hoti, koci paññāvimutto hoti,
anya-e0102n11:80_1: koci ubhatobhāgavimutto hoti, koci tevijjo, koci chaḷabhiñño, koci paṭisambhidappabhedappatto
anya-e0102n11:80_2: mahākhīṇāsavo. Yaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ ‘‘maggakkhaṇe panesa taṁ jaṭaṁ vijaṭeti nāma .
anya-e0102n11:80_3: Phalakkhaṇe vijaṭitajaṭo sadevakassa lokassa aggadakkhiṇeyyo hotī’’ti.
anya-e0102n11:82: Yasmā tasmā kareyyātha, ratiṁ tattha vicakkhaṇo.
anya-e0102n11:84: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṁ paññañca bhāvayaṁ;
anya-e0102n11:85: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭanti. –
anya-e0102n11:86: Imissā gāthāya sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desite visuddhimagge sānisaṁsā paññābhāvanā paridīpitā hotīti.
anya-e0102n11:93: ‘‘Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṁ paññañca bhāvayaṁ;
anya-e0102n11:94: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṁ vijaṭaye jaṭa’’nti. –
anya-e0102n11:124: Visuddhimaggo eso ca, antarāyaṁ vinā idha;
anya-e0102n11:128_0: 895. Parama visuddha saddhā buddhi vīriya paṭimaṇḍitena sīlācārajjava maddavādiguṇasamudayasamuditena
